gw.api.contact

Class ContactHandle

  • gw.api.contact.ContactHandle

  • public class ContactHandle
    Introduces a level of indirection to a Contact. This is required to support Contact syncing. When a Contact is synced, it is sometimes replaced with a new Java object. This happens if the Contact needs to be {@link gw.pl.persistence.core.entity.KeyableBean#downcast(gw.entity.IEntityType) downcasted}. If this happens, all existing references to the old Java object will become invalid. So, any shared sections which take a Contact should take a ContactHandle instead, so that they always get the latest, non-stale version of the Contact.
